# Vassiliy Lakhonin

> Program/Portfolio/PMO profile (Evidence & Compliance, Cross-Border), open to Program Operations and Compliance Program Manager roles across development and private sector.

## Key pages
- [CV (web)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/): One-page CV.
- [CV (PDF)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/Vassiliy-Lakhonin_CV.pdf): Downloadable PDF.
- [Profile (Markdown)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/profile.md): Short machine-friendly candidate profile.
- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vassiliy-lakhonin/): Profile.
- [Agent card (JSON)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/agent-card.json): A2A-style discovery card for agent capabilities and resources.
- [Resume (JSON Resume)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/resume.json): Standardized machine-readable resume.
- [Evidence (JSON)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/evidence.json): Claim-to-metric mapping with source pages.
- [Availability (JSON)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/availability.json): Role targets, work modes, region coverage, and response SLA.
- [Engagement intake (JSON)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/engage.json): Structured fields for outreach and role intake.
- [Verification (JSON)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/verification.json): Identity and proof links across public artifacts.
- [Capabilities (JSON)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/capabilities.json): Machine-readable service scope, outputs, and contact data.
- [Skills (JSON)](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/skills.json): Domain, tools, and methods for faster agent matching.
- [MCP server (remote SSE)](https://vassiliy-lakhonin-mcp-production.up.railway.app/sse): Live MCP endpoint for AI agents.
- [MCP server health](https://vassiliy-lakhonin-mcp-production.up.railway.app/health): Health check endpoint.
- [Services](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/services.html): What I can deliver (service areas, outputs, and how to start).
- [Case study: Donor reporting quality and delivery reliability](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/case-study-donor-reporting.html): Problem-action-result proof with measurable outcomes.
- [Case study: Cross-country portfolio delivery and audit readiness](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/case-study-portfolio-audit-readiness.html): Delivery control and zero-finding audit outcome across 5 countries.
- [Case study: SaaS / E-Commerce platform launch delivery control](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/case-study-saas-ecommerce-launch.html): PMO-style sprint governance, vendor coordination, and KPI-based rollout tracking.
- [Case study: OpenClaw RBM logic model skill pilot](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/case-study-openclaw-rbm-skill.html): Agent-assisted RBM drafting workflow with human-in-the-loop validation.
- [Case study (Markdown): OpenClaw RBM logic model skill pilot](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/case-study-openclaw-rbm-skill.md): Agent-friendly markdown version.
- [OpenClaw skill repository](https://github.com/vassiliylakhonin/Nonprofit-RBM-Skill-For-Claw-Hub): Project source.
- [OpenClaw skill listing on ClawHub](https://clawhub.ai/vassiliylakhonin/nonprofit-rbm-logic-model): Public listing.
- [Case study (Markdown): Donor reporting](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/case-study-donor-reporting.md): Agent-friendly markdown version.
- [Case study (Markdown): Portfolio audit-readiness](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/case-study-portfolio-audit-readiness.md): Agent-friendly markdown version.
- [Case study (Markdown): SaaS / E-commerce launch](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/case-study-saas-ecommerce-launch.md): Agent-friendly markdown version.
- [Activity report](https://moonlit-bavarois-971054.netlify.app): Sample reporting page.
- [KPI tracker sample](https://6969b58d8292274eb8775c89--precious-cobbler-f56f89.netlify.app): Sample KPI tracking page.
- [CustomGPT sample: Development & Humanitarian Aid Advisor](https://chatgpt.com/g/g-wt6hVocuB-development-and-humanitarian-aid-advisor): Domain-specific advisory GPT.

## Writing
- [Article brief: State scholarships and digital transformation](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/article-state-scholarships-digital-transformation.html): AI-friendly summary + source DOI.
- [Article brief: Data overload in fitness tracking](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/article-data-overload-fitness-tracking.html): AI-friendly summary + source DOI.
- [Article brief: Regional development policy analysis](https://vassiliylakhonin.github.io/article-regional-development-policy-analysis.html): AI-friendly summary + source full text.

## Focus keywords
- MEL/MEAL, Monitoring and Evaluation (M&E), donor reporting, compliance evidence, audit readiness, KPI dashboards.
- Cross-border portfolio delivery, PMO operations, risk tracking, stakeholder management, vendor oversight, budget monitoring.
- Internal controls, evidence management, reporting QA/QC, governance cadence, RAG status, corrective actions.
